searchDocs.title: Constants
searchDocs.content: Constants This item is only intended to be used by the module's authors. Private Module containing constant values used throughout the MessagingManager.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> MessagingManager.new( topic: string, callback: ( request: T, current_server_metadata: MessagingMetadata, broadcaster_server_metadata: MessagingMetadata ) → () ) → MessagingManagerObject Creating a MessagingManagerObject.

searchDocs.title: DestroyTo​
searchDocs.content: </> MessagingManager.DestroyTo(topic: string) → () Destroy a MessagingManagerObject.

searchDocs.title: FireTo​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> MessagingManager.FireTo( topic: string, request: T, including_metadata: boolean?-- [default=false] including metadata example server jobId. ) → () (One-way communication) Messaging to topic to do an action (Not-Guaranteed).

searchDocs.title: Errors
searchDocs.content: Type	Description"MessagingManagerObject not found."

searchDocs.title: InvokeTo​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> MessagingManager.InvokeTo( topic: string, request: T, approx_response_time: number?,-- [default=6] a waiting seconds before disconnect and return nil response. including_metadata: boolean?-- [default=false] including metadata example server jobId? ) → any (Two-way communication) Messaging to topic to do an action and get the response (Not-Guaranteed).

searchDocs.title: Errors
searchDocs.content: Type	Description"MessagingManagerObject not found"

searchDocs.title: Destroy​
searchDocs.content: </> MessagingManager.Destroy() → () Aliase of :DisconnectAll() method.

searchDocs.title: DisconnectAll​
searchDocs.content: </> MessagingManager:DisconnectAll() → () Disconnect all of subscription.

searchDocs.title: messaging_scaler​
searchDocs.content: </> Ports.messaging_scaler: MessagingManagerObject MessagingPort: messaging_scaler A port for scaling the subscription automatically. Based current player count per server.

searchDocs.title: messaging_invoke_receptor​
searchDocs.content: </> Ports.messaging_invoke_receptor: MessagingManagerObject MessagingPort: messaging_invoke_receptor A port for receiving the response from the other server. Act like a router and RemoteFunction but for messaging.

searchDocs.title: Installation​
searchDocs.content: Add MessagingManager to your wally.toml:  MessagingManager = "6531503070/messagingmanager@2.0.4"   tip If you're new to Wally, check out the Wally installation guide.
